allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD= psql -h localhost -U pgbudget -d pgbudget -c "SELECT uuid, name, type FROM data.accounts WHERE type = ''equity'' ORDER BY name;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD= psql -h localhost -U pgbudget -d pgbudget -c "SELECT DISTINCT user_data FROM data.accounts WHERE name = ''Unassigned'' LIMIT 5;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD= psql -h localhost -U pgbudget -d pgbudget -c "SELECT uuid FROM data.ledgers WHERE uuid = ''WkJxi8aN'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD= psql -h localhost -U pgbudget -d pgbudget -c "SELECT user_data, COUNT(*) FROM data.accounts WHERE name = ''Unassigned'' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM data.ledgers l WHERE l.id = ledger_id AND l.uuid = ''WkJxi8aN'') GROUP BY user_data;")
